problems.title: Non-decreasing Subsequences (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an integer array nums, return all the different possible non-decreasing subsequences of the given array with at least two elements. You may return the answer in any order.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
4 6 7 7

Sample Output
4 6
4 6 7
4 6 7 7
4 7
4 7 7
6 7
6 7 7
7 7

Explanation: All non-decreasing subsequences with at least 2 elements.

Sample Input
4 4 3 2 1

Sample Output
4 4

Explanation: Only one non-decreasing subsequence exists.
hintsList: Use backtracking with bit manipulation to generate all subsequences.
Track the last element in the current subsequence to ensure non-decreasing order.
